pages.text: The second of two $(l:exploiting/composer_cell)Composer Cell$() functions is the automatic filling of $(l:summoning/soulbook)Soulbooks$(), $(l:summoning/range)Murky Orbs$(), and $(l:legacy/soul_catalyst)Soul Catalysts$().$(p)To automatically fill these items with essence, place the composer cell in a convenient location, then insert your fillable (just a single one at a time!) and your essence.
